level.text: The sale, installation, or use of a rotary cup burner or the replacement of any existing burner with a rotary cup burner shall be prohibited.
The sale for use or use of fuel oil in any rotary cup burner shall be prohibited.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Section 3 of the District of Columbia Air Pollution Control Act of 1984, D.C. Law 5-165, ยง 601, 32 DCR 565, 608 (February 1, 1985).
